__inputs.name: DS_INFINITY
__inputs.label: Infinity
__inputs.description: Select your Azure Infinity data source

options.content:
# Azure Carbon Optimization Report
Emissions data is available for the previous month by day 20 of the current month.

Only 13 months of data is available at one time.

**Panels will appear broken until the Start Date and End Date are set due to limitations of the Azure API.**

targets.uql:
parse-json
| scope "value"
| project "Resource"="itemName", "Latest"=tonumber("latestMonthEmissions"), "Previous"=tonumber("previousMonthEmissions")
| extend "Resource"=replace_string("Resource",'microsoft.compute/virtualmachinescalesets','VM Scale Set')
| extend "Resource"=replace_string("Resource",'microsoft.compute/virtualmachines','Virtual Machine')
| extend "Resource"=replace_string("Resource",'microsoft.compute/disks','Disk')
| extend "Resource"=replace_string("Resource",'microsoft.storage/storageaccounts','Storage Account')
| extend "Resource"=replace_string("Resource",'microsoft.web/serverfarms','App Service Plan')
| extend "Resource"=replace_string("Resource",'Others-Exclude-Top-Items-From-Overall-Summary','Others')
| summarize "This Month"=sum("Latest"), "Last Month"=sum("Previous") by "Resource"
| order by "This Month" desc

panels.title: Total 5 by Service Type Month on Month

options.content: # Azure Carbon Optimization Report Azure Carbon API Documentation **Panels will appear broken if the the Start Date and End Date are set outside of the available data range due to limitations of the Azure API.**

panels.description: Lists subscriptions if subscription access is denied
panels.title: Azurd Subscription Access

infinityQuery.uql:
parse-json
| jsonata "($limit:=safe_day>='20'?current_month:prev_month; $years:=[2023..2026]; $months:=['01','02','03','04','05','06','07','08','09','10','11','12']; $all:=$years.($y:=$; $months.({'v':$y & '-' & $ & '-01'}))[v < $limit]; $all)"
| project "value"="v"
| order by "value" desc
| limit 13
| order by "value" asc

parse-json
| jsonata "($limit:=safe_day>='20'?current_month:prev_month; $years:=[2023..2026]; $months:=['01','02','03','04','05','06','07','08','09','10','11','12']; $all:=$years.($y:=$; $months.({'v':$y & '-' & $ & '-01'}))[v < $limit]; $all)"
| project "value"="v"
| order by "value" desc
| limit 13
| order by "value" asc
